messages.content: "I'm incredibly proud to have been reselected as your Labour candidate for Leeds North West. After two years representing you in Parliament, I promise to continue the fight for the people of North West Leeds and our local area and I hope that you give me the opportunity to do so again."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Alex has a long record as an environmental campaigner and has received awards for environmentalism.
Alex is committed to protecting local schools and the NHS, and fighting against cuts to these and other services.
A healthy city requires a healthy, robust transport system with congestion and poor air quality tackled.

issues.environment: Alex has a long record as an environmental campaigner and continues to champion environmental issues.
issues.health: Protecting local health services and the NHS, reversing cuts are key priorities.
issues.transport: Alex has a detailed Transport Strategy for Leeds. For more information visit alexsobel.co.uk/transportplan.

community.content: Improving services for his community, supporting investment in areas such as affordable housing.

quotes.text: "I'm incredibly proud to have been reselected as your Labour candidate for Leeds North West. After two years representing you in Parliament, I promise to continue the fight for the people of North West Leeds and our local area and I hope that you give me the opportunity to do so again."
